metadata.name: Silence awakening
metadata.description:
"Divine States" is a collection of 4 digital art pieces born in Bali ,that immerses the viewer on a spiritual journey , opening a portal to the divine.

Exploring the states of Silence, Creativity,Truth & Strength, we approach the border between physical & spiritual worlds, drawing a parallel between human states & the main elements of life: water, air, fire, earth.

Project is presented as a video and Gif animation with using photogrammetry of real sculptures, which were then destroyed!
â €
First character is "Silence" - a resource state to which a person returns to hear oneself. "Silence" is from the element of water, personifying harmony with oneself and the world around us.

The final piece of the collection will be a video monologue from, where the character will tell his story about himself.

This is project an international collaboration between sculptor,  3D designer, voice actor  composer, writer.
